metadata.title: CVE-2024-35978 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: Fix memory leak in hci_req_sync_complete() In'hci_req_sync_complete()', always free the previous sync request statebefore assigning reference to a new one.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
